subject: Re: dynamic loading option?
body:
On 6/14/07, Ravi Malghan  wrote:
snip
>   Dynamic Linking:
>     dlsrc=dl_dlopen.xs, dlext=so, d_dlsymun=undef, ccdlflags=' '
>     cccdlflags='-fPIC', lddlflags='-G -L/usr/local/lib'
snip

Offhand I would say you have dynamic linking.  Is the module failing
to install? If so, with what error message?

--
